body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}


In this conversation, the agent's name is Aaron Perez and the customer's name is Kelly Cooper.  The conversation is about Phat Hogs (a Motorcycle Dealership ) and is a conversation about typical situation.The customer is feeling {emotion}.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello! Welcome to Phat Hogs Motorcycle Dealership. My name is Aaron Perez, and I'm here to assist you today.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: It's great to meet you, Kelly! How can I help you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I've been looking for a new motorcycle, but I'm overwhelmed with the options.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I completely understand. We have a wide range of motorcycles to choose from. May I ask what type of riding you're interested in?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm mostly interested in cruising and touring.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Perfect! We have some fantastic models for that. To better assist you, could I have your email address so I can send you some recommendations?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Kelly! One more thing, could you provide me with your phone number to reach you if needed?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, it's two zero five, three four five, seven eight nine zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for that information, Kelly. I will look into some options for you and get back to you shortly.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Kelly! I'm here if you need anything else. Have a wonderful day!
